Version 1.0.0 released

After a solid month or so of work, the first stable version of ppl has been released to the public. This version includes the ability to store contacts’ names, organizations, email addresses, phone numbers, and birthdays.

It’s by no means feature complete at this stage, and the roadmap has details of the known deficiencies in this release.

Thanks For All Your Feedback
2012-12-21
